summary: This mod adds a little bit of better way to get lovers comfort bonus from your spouses.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a little bit of better way to get lovers comfort bonus from your spouses.
It adds a small dialogue option for your spouse which when activated your spouses goes to a bed and a small scene just like Fallout New Vegas is started.The Screen goes black some sounds effects plays and viola you are done and you get lovers comfort.

This mod doesn't contain any adult animations.
author: Praveen
